measures.name: Pnl Sensitivity Status
measures.caption: Pnl Sensitivity Status
measures.expression: Case	When [Measures].[Pnl Sensitivity Value] > [Measures].[Pnl Sensitivity Goal]		Then 1	When [Measures].[Pnl Sensitivity Value] > 0.90 * [Measures].[Pnl Sensitivity Goal]		Then 0	Else -1	End

measures.name: Data contribution Status
measures.caption: Data contribution Status
measures.expression: Case	When IsEmpty([Measures].[Data contribution Value]) OR IsEmpty([Measures].[Data contribution Goal])		Then NULL	When [Measures].[Data contribution Value] >= [Measures].[Data contribution Goal] * (1 + lookup("warning_threshold", 0.05))		Then -1	When [Measures].[Data contribution Value] > [Measures].[Data contribution Goal]		Then 0	Else 1	End

measures.name: Smoothed PnL Start
measures.caption: Smoothed PnL Start
measures.expression:
CASE
  WHEN CoalesceEmpty([Measures].[PnL Limit Status], 1) > -0.5 THEN NULL
  WHEN [Measures].[Smoothed PnL Status] > -0.5 THEN
    CDate(
      TopCount(PastPeriods([Epoch].[Epoch].CurrentMember, 15, 's'), 1, CLng(
        IIF(
          CoalesceEmpty([Measures].[PnL Limit Status], 1) <= -0.5 
          AND CoalesceEmpty(([Epoch].[Epoch].CurrentMember.NextMember, [Measures].[PnL Limit Status]), 1) > -0.5,
          [Epoch].[Epoch].CurrentMember.MemberValue,
          NULL
        )
      )).Item(0).MemberValue
    )
  WHEN [Epoch].[Epoch].CurrentMember.level.ordinal = 0 THEN
    IIF(
      NOT [Epoch].[Epoch].CurrentMember.FirstChild IS [Epoch].[Epoch].CurrentMember.LastChild
      AND CoalesceEmpty(([Epoch].[Epoch].CurrentMember.FirstChild.NextMember, [Measures].[Smoothed PnL Status]), 1) > -0.5,
      IIF(
        CoalesceEmpty(([Epoch].[Epoch].CurrentMember.FirstChild.NextMember, [Measures].[PnL Limit Status]), 1) <= -0.5,
        ([Epoch].[Epoch].CurrentMember.FirstChild.NextMember, [Measures].[Smoothed PnL Start]),
        CDATE([Epoch].[Epoch].CurrentMember.FirstChild.MemberValue)
      ),
      NULL
    )
  ELSE
    IIF(
      NOT [Epoch].[Epoch].CurrentMember IS [Epoch].[Epoch].CurrentMember.Parent.LastChild
      AND CoalesceEmpty(([Epoch].[Epoch].CurrentMember.NextMember, [Measures].[Smoothed PnL Status]), 1) > -0.5,
      IIF(
        CoalesceEmpty(([Epoch].[Epoch].CurrentMember.NextMember, [Measures].[PnL Limit Status]), 1) <= -0.5,
        ([Epoch].[Epoch].CurrentMember.NextMember, [Measures].[Smoothed PnL Start]),
        CDATE([Epoch].[Epoch].CurrentMember.MemberValue)),
      NULL
    )
END

measures.name: Tunnel Count Monitoring Status
measures.caption: Tunnel Count Monitoring Status
measures.expression: Case	When IsEmpty(lookup("lower_goal")) OR IsEmpty(lookup("upper_goal"))	Then NULL	When [Measures].[contributors.COUNT] < lookup("lower_goal") - 0.1 * ABS(lookup("lower_goal"))	Then -1	When [Measures].[contributors.COUNT] < lookup("lower_goal")	Then 0	When [Measures].[contributors.COUNT] < lookup("upper_goal")	Then 1	When [Measures].[contributors.COUNT] < lookup("upper_goal") + 0.04 * ABS(lookup("upper_goal"))	Then 0	Else -1	End

measures.name: PnL Monitoring (MDX) Trend
measures.caption: PnL Monitoring (MDX) Trend
measures.expression: Case		When [Epoch].[Epoch].CurrentMember.level.ordinal = 0			Then Case			When KpiValue("PnL Monitoring (MDX)") - (KpiValue("PnL Monitoring (MDX)"), [Epoch].[Epoch].CurrentMember.firstChild.nextMember) > 0				Then 1			When KpiValue("PnL Monitoring (MDX)") - (KpiValue("PnL Monitoring (MDX)"), [Epoch].[Epoch].CurrentMember.firstChild.nextMember) = 0				Then 0			Else -1			End		Else			Case			When KpiValue("PnL Monitoring (MDX)") - (KpiValue("PnL Monitoring (MDX)"), [Epoch].[Epoch].CurrentMember.nextMember) > 0				Then 1			When KpiValue("PnL Monitoring (MDX)") - (KpiValue("PnL Monitoring (MDX)"), [Epoch].[Epoch].CurrentMember.nextMember) = 0				Then 0			Else -1			End		End

measures.name: PnL Monitoring (LookUp) Status
measures.caption: PnL Monitoring (LookUp) Status
measures.expression:
Case When IsEmpty([Measures].[PnL Monitoring (LookUp) Goal]) Then NULL // No goal => no status 
 When [Measures].[pnl.SUM] > [Measures].[PnL Monitoring (LookUp) Goal] Then 1 Else -1 End

kpis.name: Smoothed PnL
kpis.caption: Smoothed PnL
kpis.description: PnL monitoring with a smoothing period of 15s

sets.name: Top2Underlyings
sets.caption: Top two of underlyings
sets.description: The two elements of underlyings which have the highest value

contextValues.value: PnL monitoring with a smoothing period of 15s

contextValues.name: queriesTimeLimit
contextValues.description: The amount of time (in seconds) after which a running query is cancelled and its resources reclaimed.
